titleStmt.title: The gunners dialogue VVith the Art of great artillery. By Robert Norton, enginier. and gunner.
titleStmt.author: Norton, Robert, d. 1635.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press] for Iohn Tap, and are to be sold at his shop at Saint Magnus Corner,

notesStmt.note: "Of the art of great artillery" is a separate work by Norton (cf. STC 18676).
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: his shop at Saint Magnus Corner
